thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Chicken Farm Near Coldwater

title: Chicken Farm Near Coldwater
text: Questions Business Summary Farm on 6.53 acres just outside of Coldwater, 25 min north of Barrie, 1.5 hr north of Toronto, 5 min east of hwy 400. 4 bdrm 1800 sf house, oil forced air and wood stove heating. 620' drilled well and 2 septic systems. Full hight unfinished basement. Large deck and above ground swimming pool facing open fields. Barn 34'x44', 2 outbuildings 20'x30' and 16'x32'. Lots of indoor storage space. Chicken abattoir, not licensed anymore, is located on this property, located 600' from the house, and included in the asking price. A mobile home and workshop located next to the abattoir building. Very little competition in entire Ontario for such business ... Tenant in the mobile home pays $875/month all incl Tenant in apartment in the house (lower level) pays $1,000 a month all incl The owner would be willing to rent the house for $1,000 a month all incl Potential rental income would be then $2,875 a month all incl The owner is willing to do maintenance and repairs as needed Call for detailed info about the abattoir ... Property taxes $3,500. Asking price $475,000 negotiable Andrew Sobczak On Georgian Bay Real Estate Inc. Real Estate Brokerage RR2, Box 174, Victoria Harbour, ON, L0K 2A0 cell # 705 543 1341
